main event: A bright flash of light, blue in color, was observed for about 50 seconds.
interesting points: The observation lasted a total of 50 seconds with no movement noted during the sighting., The object was reported as a possible meteor, but no descent was observed., A Northwest Airlines pilot sighted a similar flash in the sky shortly before this report., The object was reported to be at a heading bearing of 225 degrees just above the horizon., The report mentions possible explanations including balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomena.
